  2. Protesters Press Target to Take a Stand Against ICE Crackdown in Minneapolis  The New York Times
  3. Protests planned at Target headquarters as new CEO starts first day  CBS News
  4. New Target CEO faces heat as protesters plan Monday rally outside HQ over ICE  KOMO
  5. Target employees are stepping in where the company won't, as an ICE crackdown grips Minneapolis  Business Insider
